name: kry-inserters
author: Kryzeth
title: More Long Inserters
description: Adds long inserter variants of all detected inserters. Also adds burner filter inserter. Compatible with Bobsmods, Shiny Icons, ShinyBobs, AAI Industry, Industrial Revolution, Fantario, Factorio Extended Plus (FXP), Krastorio 2, and Cursed Programmable Inserters. Incompatible with bobs inserters or with the inserter overhaul setting in bobs logistics (use Side Inserters or Cursed Programmable Inserters instead)
